source: TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SEQ_00<tab>This Adarkim warrior has his eyes on a particular kind of flower.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SEQ_00<tab>再会の市のアダルキム族の男は、腕の立つ武人を探しているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_TODO_00<tab>Slay three purbols and obtain pungent flowers.
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the pungent flowers to the Adarkim warrior.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_TODO_01<tab>アダルキム族の男に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D9101 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_000<tab>Could I ask for your help? I have no one else to turn to.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_000アンタ、見るからに強そうだな。
よそから来たって感じだし、旅人だろ？
よかったら、話を聞いてくれないか。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_001<tab>I have searched all over the Azim Steppe for one single flower. Someone told me that it was sold in Reunion, but I have had no luck here either.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_001俺は、ある物を手に入れるため、アジムステップの西から東、
あらゆる場所を探してきた。
ここで売ってるって噂を聞いて来たが、運悪く品切れらしい。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_002<tab>Could you search for this flower for me? It shall not be a dangerous task by any means.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_002だが、入手法は教えてもらえた。
そこでアンタの手を借りたいってわけさ。
なぁに、ただの「花摘み」、それほど難しくは…………

source: TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_003<tab>No. I should not lie, least of all to a visitor to our land. It will be a job fraught with peril.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_003いや、よその人であるアンタを騙すのはよくないな。
正直に言うが、かなり危険な仕事になる……。
あれは、毒より危ない息を吐く化物から獲る代物らしいからな。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_004<tab>For the only way to obtain the flower I require is by slaying a purbol. If you are willing to help, you should be able to find some north of here. Please, slay three of them and bring back their flowers.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_004頼む……！
この辺りに生息しているという「」を倒して、
「」を3つ手に入れてくれ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_005<tab>Please, slay three purbols and bring back their flowers.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_005頼む……！
この辺りに生息しているという「」を倒して、
「」を3つ手に入れてくれ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_010<tab>Were you able to get three of the flowers?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_010「」が手に入ったなら、渡してくれるか。
そいつさえ手に入れれば……命が助かるんだ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_011<tab>Oh my, that stench. Quite ghastly indeed. I suppose I should tell you just why I needed these flowers.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_011ウッ……なんて強烈な臭いなんだ……！
だがいいぞ、これで誰も俺に寄りつかなくなる！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_012<tab>I belong to the Adarkim, the largest of the Xaela tribes. Recent events have led to me being considered as a future khan.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_012……っと、恩人のアンタには、事情を話しておくべきだろうな。
俺は、アダルキム族という、
アジムステップで最大規模を誇る大部族の、族長候補なんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_013<tab>The position brings with it much power and pleasures, but by the same token, it has given rise to bitter and bloody rivalries. My older brother was a candidate before me, but after no less than eight attempts on his life, he vanished with nary a trace.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_013もちろん、族長の座に就けば、馬も女も好き放題さ……。
だが、それだけに候補者同士や支持者の争いが絶えなくてね。
兄貴なんか、8回の暗殺未遂と4回の結婚詐欺を受け、姿を消した。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_014<tab>In his absence, I have risen in the line of succession, meaning <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> am now the marked man. <sigh> I did not ask for this...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_014おかげで継承順位が上がった俺が、今度は命を狙われる立場さ。
まったく、勘弁してくれよ……！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_100_015<tab>Alas, wishing that it were not so will not stay the daggers in the dark. That is why I sought out these foul-smelling flowers─to ward off would-be assassins. And thanks to your help, I may enjoy a moment's respite.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_100_015だから、「持つことで誰も寄りつかなくなる」と噂の、
がほしかったのさ……。
ありがとう、おかげでしばらくは静かな時間を過ごせそうだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_015<tab>In the meantime, I will set about finding a permanent solution to my problem. That is, finding my brother, Adkiragh. Unless I do so, there will be no peace for me...save in death.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ507_02758_SHOPPER02758_000_015よぉし、次は根本的な解決を目指すぞ！
そのためには、何としてでも出奔した兄貴……
アドキラーを連れ戻さなきゃな！
